name: Rock Edge (Game Jam Version)
description:
Made for Shacknews Jam 1.

Tap your keys to the rhythms from the heavens.

In game, use the number keys 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5 on the top of your keyboard to play along to the beats.

Theme elements used: edgewise playing Guitar Hero led to the genre, and edgewise's obscene creation of "The Hands of God" led to the skinning.

Assets Used

"Kool Kats," "Latin Industries" by Kevin MacLeod, Incompetech.  Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

GeonBit.UI 3.0.1.3 used under the MIT License.

"Hands of God" image created originally by edgewise on Shacknews.

Version History

0.9 Initial Release

0.91 Color coded notes on whether or not you hit them.
